titles.title: Marginal Well Protection Act
Marginal Well Protection Act
A bill to prohibit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from imposing a fee or reporting requirements on certain facilities for methane emissions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Marginal Well Protection Act
This bill prohibits the Environmental Protection Agency from imposing fees or reporting requirements for methane emissions from wells that produce fewer than 15 barrels of oil per day and less than 90,000 cubic feet of natural gas per day.
